long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unlock the full potential of your browsing sessions with sessionblocks!

Overwhelmed by countless tabs and multiple open windows? Tired of wasting time searching for essential pages in your bookmarks or reading lists? Upgrade from traditional browser management and multiply your productivity!

üöÄ KEY FEATURES
‚Ä¢ Organize and save your session.
Instantly categorize and save windows for later, freeing up resources and eliminating distractions. Say goodbye to sessions with hundreds of open tabs and focus on what matters most!

‚Ä¢ Simplify and preserve your workflow. 
Seamlessly drag and drop items between open and closed windows that reflect your browsing sequence, preserving context for later. Stop worrying about the bookmark void!

‚Ä¢ Efficient multi-tab operations.
Select, move, filter, find, delete various tabs simultaneously, and detect duplicates in your session with ease.

‚Ä¢ Import and export sessions.
Import and restore your sessions locally for added flexibility.
